Future efforts to reduce hepatitis-related morbidity and mortality in China should focus on preventive strategies, safe blood practices, public education, and training health staff for large-scale HBV and HCV testing and treatment provision.
391 A strict action plan to reduce the harmful use of alcohol such as an excise tax on beer, wine, and spirits, and legally binding regulations on alcohol advertising should be implemented. The Government should also implement an operational policy to reduce unhealthy dietary practices and promote physical activity to prevent NAFLD.
